meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or emphasis.
meanings.sent1: Begorrah! I can't believe my eyes!
meanings.sent3: Begorrah! Did you see that rabbit wearing sunglasses?
meanings.sent4: The news hit him like a thunderbolt, begorrah!
meanings.sent5: Begorrah! The fireworks lit up the night sky in a dazzling display.

meanings.definition: Used as a mild oath or expression of annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Oh, begorrah, I forgot my keys again!
meanings.sent2: Begorrah, why does this always happen to me?
meanings.sent3: Begorrah! The toast burnt to a crisp this time.
meanings.sent4: His computer crashed at the worst possible moment, begorrah!
meanings.sent5: Begorrah! The rain ruined my freshly washed car.
